document_data.name: Tristan
document_data.mainbody: '''Tristan''' was a soldier of the [[Flaming Fist]] that served [[Baldur's Gate]] and its people during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He had hair skin and sandy brown hair. He wore the Flaming Fist [[leather armor]] uniform, emblazoned with the symbol of military group.
document_data.History: Tristan was present at the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn when it was raided and burned down by [[goblinoid]] [[Cult of the Absolute|cultists]] of [[the Absolute]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. Trisan became a bit panicked during the disastrous event, but had enough sense to try and rescue those trapped within rather than attempt to douse the out-of-control blaze.
